description: Let the spirit of God enter your life through holy prayer. Pray God's word and see God's power. This collection of prayers from the Holy Bible have repeatedly put millions of people in touch with the life-giving power of God. Whether you are struggling in a difficult passage of life or simply want to give praise for your many blessings, this app provides you with hundreds of prayers for strength, healing, forgiveness, and peace. Fill your heart and soul with love and goodness. Search by keyword or browse by category. Save your favorites.
